text: Brenda Sommerville was a female English international table tennis player. She won a silver medal at the 1928 World Table Tennis Championships in the women's doubles with Doris Gubbins. She also won an English Open title. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:English female table tennis players Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Brenda Sommerville
